lead_paragraph: An article in some editions last Sunday about Georgetown University’s 72-69 victory over the University of Connecticut in men’s basketball on Jan. 9 misidentified the Georgetown player who passed to Greg Monroe for the final basket of the game. It was Austin Freeman, not Chris Wright.
